thread.section_title: Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Bang for the Buck
thread.title_full: Great Bang for the Buck - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Peter C
title: Great Bang for the Buck
text: Very modern and clean with all the amenities. Located in the "flower" section of the city, surrounded by flower shops and plant stores. The front desk personnel (especially Chris) were pleasant, helpful and accommodating. The roof deck view of the Freedom Tower is spectacular and I'll bet a fun time during the fair weather months when the roof bar and lounge are open.
